notes.right: To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

description.left: Indicate the donor's age of menarche, the first occurrence of menstruation.
description.right: Indicate the donor's age at which the first menstruation event occurred. (Reference: NCIt C19666)

description.left: Indicate the number of pregnancies a donor has had.
description.right: Indicate the total number of pregnancy events experienced by the donor. (Reference: NCIt C106551)

description.left: Indicate the number of children the donor has birthed.
description.right: Indicate the number of children the donor has birthed. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 2486644)

genetic_disorders.description: Indicate presence of any hereditary genetic disorders. (Reference: Genetic disorder names were standardized using Orphanet (https://www.orpha.net/) and NCI Thesaurus)
genetic_disorders.name: genetic_disorders

codeList: Familial Atypical Multiple Mole Melanoma Syndrome (FAMMM)
Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Cancer Syndrome (HBOC)
Hereditary Leiomyomatosis and Renal Cell Cancer (HLRCC)

meta.notes: If the genetic disorder term you use is not included in the controlled terminology, please contact us at https://platform.icgc-argo.org/contact to request it be added. To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

hrt_type.description: Indicate the type of hormone replacement therapy (HRT) the donor has taken or is currently taking.
hrt_type.name: hrt_type

hrt_duration.description: If donor has taken hormone replacement therapy (HRT), indicate how long donor has been taking HRT, in months. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 5365433)
hrt_duration.name: hrt_duration

contraception_type.description: Indicate the type of hormonal contraception the donor has taken or is currently taking. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 3264234)
contraception_type.name: contraception_type

contraception_duration.description: If donor has taken hormonal contraception, indicate duration of use, in months. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 5206887)
contraception_duration.name: contraception_duration

description.left: Indicate the method of specimen storage for specimens that were not extracted freshly or immediately cultured.
description.right: Indicate the method of specimen storage for specimen that were not extracted freshly or immediately cultured.

description.left: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of infiltration by tumour cells in a specimen.
description.right: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percent of tumour cells compared to the number of total cells in a specimen. (Reference: NCIt: C159484)

description.left: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents local response to cellular injury, marked by capillary dilatation, edema and leukocyte infiltration; clinically, inflammation is manifest by redness, heat, pain, swelling and loss of function, with the need to heal damaged tissue.
description.right: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percent of a specimen that is positive for inflammatory markers, including the presence of capillary dilatation, edema and increased leukocytes. (Reference NCIt C159479)

description.left: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of reactive cells that are present in a malignant tumour specimen but are not malignant such as fibroblasts, vascular structures, etc.
description.right: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of reactive cells that are present in a tumour specimen but are not malignant such as fibroblasts, vascular structures, etc. (Reference caDSR CDE ID 2841241)

description.left: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of cell death in a malignant tumour specimen.
description.right: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percent of cells undergoing necrosis compared to the number of total cells present in a tumour specimen. (Reference NCIt C159481)

description.left: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting clinical_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.).
description.right: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting clinical_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage.

description.left: If the treatment was terminated early due to acute toxicity, indicate whether it was due to hemotological toxicity or non-hemotological toxicity.
description.right: If the treatment was terminated early due to acute toxicity, indicate whether it was due to hematological toxicity or non-hematological toxicity.

hematological_toxicity.name: hematological_toxicity
hematological_toxicity.description: Indicate the hematological toxicities which caused early termination of the treatment. (Codelist reference: NCI-CTCAE (v5.0))

meta.notes: To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

non-hematological_toxicity.name: non-hematological_toxicity
non-hematological_toxicity.description: Indicate the non-hematological toxicities which caused early termination of the treatment. (Codelist reference: NCI-CTCAE (v5.0))

meta.notes: To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

hemotological_toxicity.name: hemotological_toxicity
hemotological_toxicity.description: Indicate the hemotological toxicities which caused early termination of the treatment. (Codelist reference: NCI-CTCAE (v5.0))

meta.notes: To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

description.left: Name of agent or drug administered to patient as part of the treatment regimen.
description.right: Name of agent or drug administered to donor as part of the treatment regimen.

description.left: Name of agent or drug administered to patient as part of the treatment regimen.
description.right: Name of agent or drug administered to donor as part of the treatment regimen.

description.left: Indicate the type of immunotherapy administered to patient.
description.right: Indicate the type of immunotherapy administered to donor.

description.left: Name of agent or drug administered to patient as part of the treatment regimen.
description.right: Name of agent or drug administered to donor as part of the treatment regimen.

anatomic_site_progression_or_recurrence.description: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code for the anatomic site where disease progression, relapse or recurrence occurred, according to the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (WHO ICD-O-3). Refer to the ICD-O-3 manual for guidelines at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344.
anatomic_site_progression_or_recurrence.name: anatomic_site_progression_or_recurrence

meta.notes: This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.

anatomic_site_progression_or_recurrences.description: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code for the anatomic site where disease progression, relapse or recurrence occurred, according to the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (WHO ICD-O-3). Refer to the ICD-O-3 manual for guidelines at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344.
anatomic_site_progression_or_recurrences.name: anatomic_site_progression_or_recurrences

meta.notes: This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.

description.left: Indicate if patient has any genetic relatives with a history of cancer. (Reference: NCIt C159104, caDSR CDE ID 6161023)
description.right: Indicate if donor has any genetic relatives with a history of cancer. (Reference: NCIt C159104, caDSR CDE ID 6161023)

description.left: Indicate genetic relationship of the relative to patient. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 2179937)
description.right: Indicate genetic relationship of the relative to the donor. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 2179937)

description.left: The age (in years) when the patient's relative was first diagnosed. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 5300571)
description.right: The age (in years) when the donor's relative was first diagnosed. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 5300571)

description.left: The code to describe the malignant diagnosis of the patient's relative with a history of cancer using the WHO ICD-10 code (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2019/en) classification.
description.right: The code to describe the malignant diagnosis of the donor's relative with a history of cancer using the WHO ICD-10 code (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2019/en) classification.

program_id.name: program_id
program_id.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

submitter_donor_id.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.
submitter_donor_id.name: submitter_donor_id

tobacco_smoking_status.description: Indicate donor's self-reported smoking status and history. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 2181650)
tobacco_smoking_status.name: tobacco_smoking_status

meta.notes: Current smoker: Has smoked 100 cigarettes in their lifetime and who currently smokes. Includes daily smokers and non-daily smokers (also known as occassional smokers). Current reformed smoker for >15 years: A person who currently does not smoke and has been a non-smoker for more than 15 years, but has smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their life. Current reformed smoker for <= 15 years: A person who currently does not smoke and has been a non-smoker for less than 15 years, but has smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their life. Current reformed smoker, duration not specified: A person who currently does not smoke and has been a non-smoker for unspecified time, but has smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their lifetime. Smoking history not documented: Smoking history has not be recorded or is unknown.

codeList: Current reformed smoker, duration not specified
Lifelong non-smoker (<100 cigarettes smoked in lifetime)

tobacco_type.description: Indicate the type(s) of tobacco used by donor. (Reference: NCIt CDE C177629)
tobacco_type.name: tobacco_type

meta.notes: To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

pack_years_smoked.description: This field applies to cigarettes. Indicate the smoking intensity in Pack Years, where the number of pack years is defined as the number of cigarettes smoked per day times (x) the number of years smoked divided (/) by 20. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 2955385)
pack_years_smoked.name: pack_years_smoked

alcohol_history.description: Indicate if the donor has consumed at least 12 drinks of any alcoholic beverage in their lifetime. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 2201918)
alcohol_history.name: alcohol_history

alcohol_consumption_category.description: Describe the donor's current level of alcohol use as self-reported by the donor. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 3457767)
alcohol_consumption_category.name: alcohol_consumption_category

codeList: Social Drinker (> once a month, < once a week)

alcohol_type.description: Indicate the type(s) of alcohol the donor consumes. (Reference: NCIt CDE C173647)
alcohol_type.name: alcohol_type

meta.notes: To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

opiate_use.description: Indicate if the donor has ever used opium or other opiates like opium juice, heroin, or Sukhteh regularly (at least weekly over a 6-month period).
opiate_use.name: opiate_use

hot_drinks_consumption.description: Indicate if the donor regularly drinks tea, coffee, or other hot drinks.
hot_drinks_consumption.name: hot_drinks_consumption

red_meat_frequency.description: Indicate how frequently the donor eats red meat. Examples of red meat include beef, veal, pork, lamb, mutton, horse, or goat meat.
red_meat_frequency.name: red_meat_frequency

codeList: Most days but not every day

processed_meat_frequency.description: Indicate how frequently the patient eats processed meat. Examples of processed meat include hams, salamis, or sausages.
processed_meat_frequency.name: processed_meat_frequency

codeList: Most days but not every day

soft_drinks_frequency.description: Indicate the frequency of soft drink consumption by the donor.
soft_drinks_frequency.name: soft_drinks_frequency

codeList: Most days but not every day

exercise_frequency.description: Indicate how many times per week the donor exercises for at least 30 minutes. (Reference: NCIt CDE C25367)
exercise_frequency.name: exercise_frequency

codeList: Most days but not every day

exercise_intensity.description: Indicate the intensity of exercise. (Reference: NCIt CDE C25539)
exercise_intensity.name: exercise_intensity

codeList: Low: No increase in the heart beat, and no perspiration
Moderate: Increase in the heart beat slightly with some light perspiration
Vigorous: Increase in the heart beat substantially with heavy perspiration

program_id.name: program_id
program_id.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

submitter_donor_id.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.
submitter_donor_id.name: submitter_donor_id

submitter_specimen_id.name: submitter_specimen_id
submitter_specimen_id.description: Unique identifier of the specimen, assigned by the data provider.

submitter_primary_diagnosis_id.name: submitter_primary_diagnosis_id
submitter_primary_diagnosis_id.description: If the biomarker test was done at the time of primary diagnosis, then indicate the associated submitter_primary_diagnosis_id here.

submitter_treatment_id.name: submitter_treatment_id
submitter_treatment_id.description: If the biomarker test was done at the initiation of a specific treatment regimen, indicate the associated submitter_treatment_id here.

submitter_follow_up_id.description: If the biomarker test was done during a follow-up event, then indicate the associated submitter_follow_up_id here.
submitter_follow_up_id.name: submitter_follow_up_id

test_interval.description: If the biomarker test was not associated with a specific specimen or follow-up, primary diagnosis or treatment event, then indicate the interval of time since primary diagnosis that the biomarker test was performed at, in days.
test_interval.name: test_interval

meta.notes: This field is required if the biomarker test is not associated with a specimen or primary diagnosis, treatment or follow-up event. The associated primary diagnosis is used as the reference point for this interval. To calculate this, find the number of days since the date of primary diagnosis.

ca19-9_level.description: Indicate the level of carbohydrate antigen 19-9 (CA19-9). Carbohydrate antigen 19-9 testing is useful to monitor the response to treatment in pancreatic cancer patients. (Reference: LOINC: 24108-3)
ca19-9_level.name: ca19-9_level

crp_levels.description: Indicate the quantitative measurement of the amount of CRP, an inflammatory marker, in the blood in mg/L. Used for screening and monitoring for inflammatory disease, infections, and for cardiovascular disease risk assessment. (Reference: NCIt C64548, LOINC 30522-7)
crp_levels.name: crp_levels

ldl_level.description: Indicate the level of lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), in IU/L. An increased amount of LDH in the blood may be a sign of tissue damage and some types of cancer. (Reference: NCI)
ldl_level.name: ldl_level

anc.description: Indicate the value for a hematology laboratory test for the absolute number of neutrophil cells present in a sample of peripheral blood from a donor, in cells/uL. The ANC may be used to check for infection, inflammation, leukemia and other conditions. Cancer treatment such as chemotherapy may reduce the ANC. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID: 2180198)
anc.name: anc

alc.description: Indicate the absolute number of lymphocytes (ALC) found in a given volume of blood, as cells/uL. Lymphocytes help fight off infections and an altered cellular immune function has been demonstrated in patients with cancer. (Reference: NCIt: C113237)
alc.name: alc

brca_carrier.description: Indicate whether donor is a carrier of a mutation in a BRCA gene. A mutation in this gene is associated with an increased risk of familial breast and ovarian cancer.
brca_carrier.name: brca_carrier

er_status.description: Indicate the expression of estrogen receptor (ER). (Reference: NAACCR 3827)
er_status.name: er_status

er_allred_score.description: Indicate the Allred score for estrogen receptor. The Allred score is based on the percentage of cells that stain positive by immunohistochemistry (IHC) for estrogen receptor (ER) and the intensity of that staining. (Reference: NAACCR: 3828, caDSR CDE ID 2725288)
er_allred_score.name: er_allred_score

er_percent_positive.name: er_percent_positive
er_percent_positive.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percent of cells staining estrogen receptor positive by immunohistochemistry (IHC).

her2_ihc_status.description: Indicate the expression of human epidermal growth factor receptor-2 (HER2) assessed by immunohistochemistry (IHC). (Reference: AJCC 8th Edition, Chapter 48)
her2_ihc_status.name: her2_ihc_status

meta.notes: Negative: 0 or 1+ staining, Equivocal: 2+ staining, Positive: 3+ staining

her2_ish_status.description: Indicate the expression of human epidermal growth factor receptor-2 (HER2) assessed by in situ hybridization (ISH). (Reference: NAACCR: 3854)
her2_ish_status.name: her2_ish_status

pr_status.description: Indicate the expression of progesterone receptor (PR). (Reference: NAACCR 3915)
pr_status.name: pr_status

pr_allred_score.description: Indicate the Allred score for progesterone receptor. The Allred score is based on the percentage of cells that stain positive by IHC for the progesterone receptor (PR) and the intensity of that staining. (Reference: NAACCR 3916)
pr_allred_score.name: pr_allred_score

pr_percent_positive.name: pr_percent_positive
pr_percent_positive.description: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percent of cells staining progesterone receptor positive by immunohistochemistry (IHC).

pd-l1_status.description: Indicate the immunohistochemical test result that refers to the over-expression or lack of expression of programmed death ligand 1 (PD-L1) in a tissue sample of a primary or metastatic malignant neoplasm. (Reference NCIt: C122807)
pd-l1_status.name: pd-l1_status

alk_ihc_status.description: Indicate the expression of anaplastic lymphoma receptor tyrosine kinase (ALK) as assessed by immunohistochemistry (IHC). Abnormalities of ALK can be present in lung cancers.
alk_ihc_status.name: alk_ihc_status

alk_ihc_intensity.description: Indicate the intensity of anaplastic lymphoma receptor tyrosine kinase (ALK) as assessed by immunohistochemistry (IHC). Abnormalities of ALK can be present in lung cancers.
alk_ihc_intensity.name: alk_ihc_intensity

alk_fish_status.description: Indicate the expression of anaplastic lymphoma receptor tyrosine kinase (ALK) as assessed by fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH). Abnormalities of ALK can be present in lung cancers.
alk_fish_status.name: alk_fish_status

ros1_ihc_status.description: Indicate the expression of receptor lymphoma kinase (ROS1) as assessed by immunohistochemistry (IHC). Gene fusions involving ROS1 can be present in lung cancers.
ros1_ihc_status.name: ros1_ihc_status

pan-trk_ihc_status.description: Indicate the expression of Pan-TRK as assessed by immunohistochemistry (IHC). Pan-TRK IHC screens for neurotrophic tyrosine kinase receptor (NTRK) fusions which have been described in many cancers including lung, thyroid and colorectal cancers.
pan-trk_ihc_status.name: pan-trk_ihc_status

ret_fish_status.description: Indicate the expression of gene arrangement involving the RET proto-oncogene (RET1) as assessed by fluorescence in situ hybridization (FISH). RET gene rearrangements are associated with several different neoplastic conditions. (Reference: NCIt C46005)
ret_fish_status.name: ret_fish_status

hpv_ihc_status.description: Indicate the expression of Human papillomavirus (HPV) p16 as assessed by immunohistochemistry (IHC).
hpv_ihc_status.name: hpv_ihc_status

hpv_dna_status.description: Indicate the expression of Human papillomavirus (HPV) as assessed using a laboratory test in which cells are scraped from the cervix to look for DNA of HPV. (Reference: NCIt C93141)
hpv_dna_status.name: hpv_dna_status

program_id.name: program_id
program_id.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

submitter_donor_id.name: submitter_donor_id
submitter_donor_id.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

laterality_of_prior_malignancy.name: laterality_of_prior_malignancy
laterality_of_prior_malignancy.description: If donor has history of prior malignancy, indicate laterality of previous diagnosis. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 4122391)

age_at_comorbidity_diagnosis.name: age_at_comorbidity_diagnosis
age_at_comorbidity_diagnosis.description: Indicate the age of comorbidity diagnosis, in years.

comorbidity_type_code.name: comorbidity_type_code
comorbidity_type_code.description: Indicate the code for the comorbidity using the WHO ICD-10 code classification (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2019/en).

comorbidity_treatment_status.name: comorbidity_treatment_status
comorbidity_treatment_status.description: Indicate if the patient is being treated for the comorbidity (this includes prior malignancies).

comorbidity_treatment.name: comorbidity_treatment
comorbidity_treatment.description: Indicate treatment details for the comorbidity (this includes prior malignancies).
